    • 字段详细资料

      • ACTION_NETWORK_STATE_CHANGED

        public static final java.lang.String ACTION_NETWORK_STATE_CHANGED
        Network connect state changed. Get connect state by broadcast intent#getBooleanExtra(EXTRA_NETWORK_STATE,false).
        If current system network is connected,app can get current network info by intent#getParcelableExtra(EXTRA_NETWORK_STATE),
        if current system network is disconnected and previous state is connected, app can also get the previous network info by intent#getParcelableExtra(EXTRA_PRE_NETWORK_INFO) and will return null if previous state is disconnected.
        另请参阅:
        EXTRA_NETWORK_STATE, EXTRA_NETWORK_INFO, EXTRA_PRE_NETWORK_INFO, 常量字段值

      • ACTION_NETWORK_TYPE_CHANGED

        public static final java.lang.String ACTION_NETWORK_TYPE_CHANGED
        Network type changed. Means network type changed,such as network changed form wifi to mobile,or from mobile to wifi,or form ethernet to wifi etc. app can get previous network info by extra EXTRA_PRE_NETWORK_INFO and get current network info by extra EXTRA_NETWORK_INFO.
        When receive this broadcast notification,app will also receive a network connected notification if app register the ACTION_NETWORK_STATE_CHANGED broadcast receiver.
        另请参阅:
        EXTRA_NETWORK_INFO, EXTRA_PRE_NETWORK_INFO, 常量字段值

      • EXTRA_NETWORK_STATE

        public static final java.lang.String EXTRA_NETWORK_STATE
        Network connect state change broad action extra key.
        另请参阅:
        ACTION_NETWORK_STATE_CHANGED, 常量字段值

      • EXTRA_NETWORK_INFO

        public static final java.lang.String EXTRA_NETWORK_INFO
        Network info extras key.
        另请参阅:
        ACTION_NETWORK_STATE_CHANGED, ACTION_NETWORK_TYPE_CHANGED, 常量字段值

      • EXTRA_PRE_NETWORK_INFO

        public static final java.lang.String EXTRA_PRE_NETWORK_INFO
        The previous Network info extras.
        另请参阅:
        ACTION_NETWORK_STATE_CHANGED, ACTION_NETWORK_TYPE_CHANGED, 常量字段值
